content: market day shawlette a crochet pattern by ashley beals @everyday with ashley market day shawlette finished size triangle shape worked top down dimensions tip to tip - 43 depth - 20 yarn and hook fingering weight yarn - i used one skein of fenn by palouse yarn co in the color raspberry beret yardage approximately 437 yards hook g gauge 4 = approx 16 sts/13 row worked in pattern while gauge is important for the yardage requirements of this pattern you can also play with the gauge as long as you keep in mind the yardage you have available *please note that if your gauge is significantly different that mine you may have altered yardage needs * contact have questions feel free to message me on instagram @everyday with ashley or email me everydaywithashley2021@gmail com abbreviations and special stitches chain - chain st/sts - stitch/stitches skip - skip single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch space - space market day shawlette pattern create a magic loop and chain 2 in the magic loop 3 half_double_crochet chain 2 3 half_double_crochet row 1 chain 1 and turn 2 half_double_crochet in first st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts half_double_crochet chain 2 half_double_crochet in the chain 2 space from the row below half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet in last stitch 10 half_double_crochet 1 chain 2 space row 2 chain 1 and turn 2 half_double_crochet in first st half_double_crochet in each st until chain 2 space from the row below half_double_crochet chain 2 half_double_crochet in chain 2 space from the row below half_double_crochet in each st until last st 2 half_double_crochet in last st 14 half_double_crochet 1 chain 2 space row 3 repeat row 2 18 half_double_crochet 1 chain 2 space row 4 chain 1 and turn 2 half_double_crochet in first st chain 1 skip 1 half_double_crochet in next st repeat from to until the chain 2 space from the row below half_double_crochet chain 2 half_double_crochet in the chain 2 space from the row below half_double_crochet chain 1 skip 1 until last st 2 half_double_crochet in last st 14 half_double_crochet 8 chain 1 space 1 chain 2 space row 5 chain 1 and turn 2 half_double_crochet in first st 1 half_double_crochet into each half_double_crochet and chain 1 space from the row below until the chain 2 space from the row below half_double_crochet chain 2 half_double_crochet in the chain 2 space from the row below half_double_crochet into each half_double_crochet and chain 1 space from the row below until last 2 half_double_crochet in last st 26 half_double_crochet 1 chain 2 space row 6-7 repeat row 2 30-34 half_double_crochet 1 chain 2 space row 8 repeat row 4 22 half_double_crochet 16 chain 1 space 1 chain 2 space row 9 repeat row 5 42 half_double_crochet 1 chain 2 space repeat row 6-9 10 more times repeat row 2 one more time then start edging market day shawlette edging and ties row 1 ch1 and turn skip 2
